data: For use ONLY at Crosstown Clinic
For patients who have completed the initial titration
If/when a patient is absent less than or equal to 96 hours, Then continue with prescribed dose
Notify provider of patients absence if absent for more than 10 days and inquire about continuation of prescription
For patient absent for more than 96 hours
clinical opiate withdrawal scale (COWS assessment and monitoring)
If/when patient is absent for more than 96 hours, Then Nursing to assess reason for absence
If/when patient is absent for more than 96 hours, Then Follow Missed Days Protocol for Post-Initiation Dose of High Dose Hydromorphone until patient titrated back to prescribed dose of Hydromorphone
If/when patient is absent for more than 96 hours, Then Follow Missed Days Protocol for Post-Initiation Dose of Diacetylmorphine until patient titrated back to prescribed dose of Diacetylmorphine
If/when patient is absent for more than 96 hours, Then Nurse to order urine drug screen
